Modules

Here is a list of all modules:
  • Top level functions that form the prefered API.
  • API that allows full control of XSPRESS3 algorithm, used from xspress3.server, but probably not required if xsp3_restore_settings is being used.
  • Lower level functions used internally which can used to get more detailed control.
  • Function provided to assist in system debugging.
  • API that allows unconventional modes of operation.
  • Macros for XSPRESS3
    • Address offsets of per channel registers
    • Neighbour event mode (Currently I20 64 el specific)
    • Setting for calibration event generator.
    • Address offsets of global registers
    • Global reset Generator Register layout
    • Flags to disable Thread per card options
    • Macros to describe features enabled in current firmware build
      • Crosstalk Glitch detector type.
      • Running Average processing options.
    • Internal Time Frame Generator Register arrangement
      • Internal Time Frame Generator Trigger Modes
      • Internal Time Frame Generator Minimum frame to frame gap
    • Macros to control the DMA engined in the FPGA.
      • Number used to identify DMA streams controlled by PPC1 in the Virtex-5 FPGA.
      • Binary Mask used to identify multiple DMA streams controlled by PPC1 in the Virtex-5 FPGA.
  • Layouts of Scope moed data module to suit various hardware/firmware/software.
